item.title: Heineken CEO on Earnings, US-EU Trade Deal, Outlook
item.description: Heineken CEO Dolf van den Brink discusses the company’s performance in the second quarter as Dutch brewer reported a 0.4% fall in volumes. Van den Brink also talks about the significance of the trade
